bibl.title: William H. Willis: Bibliography.
bibl.note: BASP 22 (1985) Nos 1-4 is a volume of Classical Studies presented to William Hailey Willis on the Occasion of his Retirement from Duke University. - See pp. v-vii, 1 portrait: Gerald M. Browne, James G. Keenan and Susan A. Stephens, In Honor of William Hailey Willis.
bibl.seg: BASP 22 (1985) Nos 1-4 is a volume of Classical Studies presented to William Hailey Willis on the Occasion of his Retirement from Duke University. - See pp. v-vii, 1 portrait: Gerald M. Browne, James G. Keenan and Susan A. Stephens, In Honor of William Hailey Willis.
